summary: This is an internal email from June 8, 2020, where an individual informs a press office contact about a communication with an Assistant U.S. Attorney (AUSA). The AUSA stated that the Southern District of New York (SDNY) planned to issue a statement in response to public comments made by Prince Andrew's legal counsel, and that the statement was being drafted. The email serves as a heads-up for potential press coordination.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: The email discusses a planned SDNY statement in response to a public statement made by his legal counsel.

events.title: Internal email about SDNY statement on Prince Andrew
events.description: An individual emails a press office contact to relay that an AUSA said SDNY was drafting a statement regarding public comments from Prince Andrew's counsel.

keyFacts: The Southern District of New York (SDNY) was planning to issue a public statement regarding Prince Andrew's legal counsel in June 2020.
An Assistant U.S. Attorney (AUSA) communicated this plan to an individual, who then relayed it internally to a press office.
The email indicates internal coordination within an organization (likely a media or government entity) regarding the SDNY's public communications on the Epstein/Prince Andrew case.
